title: SCP-3085
content:
[[include component:preview
text=
What happens when a reality bender dies?
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:scp-pride]]
[[include info:start]]
⚠️ **Content warning:** This work of fiction involves scenes which depict or allude to topics which may be particularly distressing for some readers.

* Suicide
[[include info:end]]
